name: HURRICANE
description: For each affected Stack, turn into waste unless pay 1 cybernation level

name: WILDFIRES
description: Turn stack into waste unless pay 1 cybernation level

name: VOLCANIC ASH
description: Turn stack into wild unless pay 1 cybernation level

name: FLOODS
description: Turn stack into wild unless pay 1 cybernation level

name: AIR POLLUTION SPIKE
description: For each developed stack, decrement 2 cohesion

name: CLIMATE MIGRATION
description: If the affected Stack is DevA/B, turn into waste and cohesion -1

name: ARIDIFICATION
description: If the affected Stack is DevA/B, turn into waste and cohesion -1

name: RISING SEA LEVELS
description: If the affected Stack is DevA/B, turn into waste and cohesion -1

name: TECH-MEDIATED ISOLATION
description: If Technology > Human Relation, cohesion -2

name: RAMPANT MONOCULTURES
description: Cannot gain more than 4 environment until the end of turn

name: GLACIAL MELT
description: If the selected stack is Wild, flip it -> become waste

name: DESERTIFICATION
description: If the selected stack is Wild, flip it -> become waste

name: OVERWHELMING SALINATION
description: If the selected stack is Wild, flip it -> become waste

name: RISING CRIME
description: Lose 2 cohesion

name: RAMPANT DISINFORMATION
description: Lose 2 cohesion

name: DISEASE OUTBREAK
description: For each developed stack, decrement 2 cohesion

name: SOCIETAL SHIFT
description: Swap Goal

name: PARADIGM SHIFT
description: Discard all cards on the Goal track. Draw a new Goal card and place it on the Community board (its Start effects do not apply).

name: COMMUNITY LEADERS
description: Move 1 people token to a new, unoccupied position or gain 2 HumanRelation

name: TECHNOLOGY BREAKTHROUGH
description: You may choose to pay 1 HumanRelation and 1 Technology to place a DevA tile on an undeveloped Stack

name: NEW HORIZONS
description: Trade 1 resource for 1 resource

name: FOCUSSED RESEARCH
description: For each developed stack, gain 2 relationships or gain 1 cybernation level

name: FUTURES THINKING
description: Gain 2 cybernation level or draw up to 3 Feedback token from the bag. For each token, place it into the bag or discard it

name: BLOOM-COVERED PLATEAUS
description: If affected stack is waste, flip it. In addition, may pay 1 environment to gain 1 cybernation level

name: LUSH JUNGLES
description: For each waste stack, flip it. In addition, may pay 1 environment to gain 1 cybernation level

name: THRIVING MANGROVES
description: For each waste stack, flip it. In addition, may pay 1 environment to gain 1 cybernation level

name: REBIRTH OF COMMUNITY
description: Gain 2 Cohesion, then gain 5 Relationships

name: WINDFALL
description: Gain 10 resources

name: EMPATHY
description: Gain 2 Cohesion, or ignore cohesion effect for this turn

name: BIO-INSPIRED DESIGN
description: For each waste or wild block, gain 1 relation or 1 cybernation level
